title: Determining All Possible Values of X
text: We want to know all the total possible values of X, not just the values we want.

title: Determining All Possible Values of X
text: Understanding that the values that X takes on includes the entire set of possible number of not technically proficient members that can be selected, what values does X take on? In other words, what are the possible number of not technically proficient members selected in the technology task force?
